name: Astro Crash (itch)
description:
Astro Crash is an homage to 1979 arcade game "Asteroids" - made in Unity with a glowy neon visual style.

Shoot the rocks into smaller pieces, and avoid damaging your craft by hitting debris or pesky UFOs.

Play with keyboard or controller (e.g. XBox 360, XBox One)

CONTROLS

Turn Left : Left Arrow / A

Turn Right: Right Arrow / D

Fire: Left Alt / Right Ctrl

Thrust: Left Ctrl / W

Warp: Spacebar

The game is basically complete, but I may add some extra features at some point in the future.
